subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis quarterback, who missed the team’s final nine games last season after having a torn anterior cruciate ligament repaired, was hurt in the first quarter of a preseason game against Cleveland.
snippet: The St. Louis quarterback, who missed the team’s final nine games last season after having a torn anterior cruciate ligament repaired, was hurt in the first quarter of a preseason game against Cleveland.
